eiteam.esteemedinnovation.api.tile

Interface ThumperAdjacentBehaviorModifier


  • public interface ThumperAdjacentBehaviorModifier
    An adjacent block modifier for the Thumper is a Tile Entity which modifies the behavior of the Thumper when it is adjacent.

    ThumperAdjacentBehaviorModifiers are expected to be Tile Entities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dropItems(SteamTransporterTileEntity thumper, java.util.List<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> drops, net.minecraft.block.state.IBlockState state, java.util.Collection<ThumperAdjacentBehaviorModifier> allBehaviorModifiers, net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing directionIn)
      Called when the Thumper is harvesting a block.
      boolean isValidBehaviorModifier(SteamTransporterTileEntity thumper, net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing directionIn)
      Called to ensure that this behavior modifier is actually valid.

    • Method Detail

      • dropItems

        void dropItems(SteamTransporterTileEntity thumper,
               java.util.List<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> drops,
               net.minecraft.block.state.IBlockState state,
               java.util.Collection<ThumperAdjacentBehaviorModifier> allBehaviorModifiers,
               net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing directionIn)
        Called when the Thumper is harvesting a block. The block has not been turned into air (broken) at this point.
        Parameters:
        thumper - The Thumper that is harvesting the block.
        drops - All of the drops for this block. You must remove drops you process from this list, otherwise you run the risk of creating a duping bug.
        state - The block state currently being harvested by the Thumper.
        allBehaviorModifiers - A list of all of the adjacent behavior modifiers for this Thumper, including this.
        directionIn - The direction from the Thumper that this behavior modifier was found in.

      • isValidBehaviorModifier

        boolean isValidBehaviorModifier(SteamTransporterTileEntity thumper,
                                net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing directionIn)
        Called to ensure that this behavior modifier is actually valid. Use this to make sure that it is configured properly.
        Parameters:
        thumper - The Thumper that is being checked.
        directionIn -
        Returns:
        Whether this behavior modifier can be used to modify Thumper behavior.
